title.rendered: Get Every Self-Employed Tax Deduction You Deserve

content.rendered:
A tax solution just for freelancers and contractors

This year, we’re teaming with TurboTax to give Fiverr Workspace users easy access to the tools needed to get your taxes done right and every deduction you deserve. TurboTax Self-Employed products are personal and business tax solutions created for the unique tax situations of self-employed freelancers like you.

Every deduction found. Every dollar you deserve.

TurboTax Self-Employed searches for over 500 deductions and credits.  Based on your unique situation, it finds the deductions and credits that apply to you so you get everything you deserve. The best part? You don’t have to have any tax knowledge – TurboTax asks you simple questions about your life and work and puts information on all the right tax forms for you.

Unlimited tax advice, year round

If you have questions about your tax situation and need help from a tax expert, TurboTax has a solution for you. With TurboTax Live Self-Employed, you can get unlimited tax advice as you go through your return – and all year long – from real tax experts who know self-employment taxes inside and out. You can even get a final review of your return before you file.

Personalized matching to a dedicated expert

Do you have better things to do with your time than taxes? With TurboTax Live Full Service, a self-employment tax expert will even do your taxes for you, start to finish. Your dedicated tax expert will take the time to get to know you and your unique situation personally so they can get you the best outcome.

Trusted technology

TurboTax Self-Employed products are powered by proven technology from the #1 best-selling tax software provider, TurboTax.

This year, feel confident your taxes are done right – try TurboTax. 

Disclaimer:

Visit http://turbotax.intuit.com/lp/yoy/guarantees.jsp for TurboTax product guarantees and other important information. Limited time offer for TurboTax 2021. Terms, conditions, features, availability, pricing, fees, service and support options subject to change without notice. Intuit, TurboTax and TurboTax Online, among others, are registered trademarks and/or service marks of Intuit Inc. in the United States and other countries.
